name: Disconnected: Drone Boogaloo; Typical Martian Tuesday
name_original: Disconnected: Drone Boogaloo; Typical Martian Tuesday
description:
Disconnected: Drone Boogaloo; Typical Martian Tuesday is a game developed by Facehead. It came out on 10-11-2019.
You can play Disconnected: Drone Boogaloo; Typical Martian Tuesday on Android. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
